amendment.description: Amendment makes available an additional $2.5 million for the Food and Drug Administration Office of Generic Drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that $2,500,000 is available for the purpose of carrying out the responsibilities of the FDA with respect to abbreviated applications for the approval of new drugs and that $250,000 is available for the purpose of carrying out public information programs regarding drugs with approved such applications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 324 - 89 (Roll no. 208).
